help_download: ğŸ¥ Video Download Guide 1ï¸âƒ£ Click the ğŸ“¥ Download button 2ï¸âƒ£ Send the YouTube link or type the video title 3ï¸âƒ£ Video information will be displayed 4ï¸âƒ£ Select Select Video Quality, Extract Audio (MP3) or Download with Subtitle (VIP ğŸ”’) 5ï¸âƒ£ Click your desired quality 6ï¸âƒ£ The file will be sent to you âœ… After successful download, your statistics will be updated.
help_search: ğŸ” Video Search and Download Guide To download a video, you have two methods: â€¢ Direct YouTube link (https://youtube.com/... or https://youtu.be/...) â€¢ Or type the video title or related keywords. If you send keywords, the bot will search YouTube for up to 10 related results and display them. Just select one of the results to start the download process. ğŸ’¡ Tip: For more accurate results, use the full title or specific keywords.
help_plans: ğŸ“Š PeakTube Plans and Features ğŸ†“ Free Plan â€¢ Maximum quality 480p â€¢ No access to official subtitles â€¢ Limited daily download limit â­ Premium Plan â€¢ Quality up to 1080p Full HD â€¢ Full access to official subtitles â€¢ Higher processing priority â€¢ Dedicated AI support ğŸ‘‘ Professional Plan â€¢ Quality up to 4K and higher â€¢ Dedicated speed and bandwidth (faster downloads) â€¢ Permanently embedded subtitles on video â€¢ VIP priority and advanced features For more details and upgrade, visit the ğŸ›’ Account Upgrade section.

All statistics are updated in real-time.
help_referral: ğŸ¤ Friend Invitation System (Referral) Guide Invite your friends to PeakTube and get rewards! âœ… Your referral link is displayed in the Invite Friends section. âœ… Any user who enters the bot with your link and performs at least one successful download will be registered as a successful referral. âœ… For each successful referral, extra downloads (gift) will be added to your account. âœ… In higher plans, referral rewards are greater and there is even the possibility of receiving a free subscription. Your successful referral count is always visible in your profile and the Invite Friends section.

about_menu_title: â„¹ï¸ About PeakTube Please select one of the sections below:
about_peaktube_content: ğŸ“Œ About PeakTube PeakTube is an advanced and professional platform for downloading YouTube videos, designed to provide the best user experience for the Persian-speaking community. Main Features: ğŸ¥ High-Quality Downloads Support for various qualities from 480p to 4K and higher ğŸµ Audio Extraction Convert videos to high-quality MP3 files ğŸ’¬ Official Subtitles Access to official YouTube subtitles and ability to embed them on videos ğŸ¤– Intelligent Support AI-powered assistant to answer your questions âš¡ High Speed Fast downloads with no limits for premium users PeakTube focuses on simplicity, speed, and quality, providing you with a unique video downloading experience.
about_future_vision_content: ğŸš€ PeakTube Future Vision We are constantly improving and developing PeakTube. In the near future, the following features will be added to the platform: ğŸ¤– Advanced Intelligent Support Upgrading the intelligent support system with more capabilities and more accurate responses ğŸ“± Mobile Application Launch of dedicated apps for iOS and Android ğŸŒ Web Panel Access to PeakTube through browser with modern user interface ğŸ¯ Smart Quality Detection Advanced system to suggest the best quality based on video content âš¡ Performance Improvements Optimization of servers and algorithms for greater speed and stability We are committed to providing the best possible experience for our users and are continuously working on new features and technical improvements.
about_team_content: ğŸ‘¥ PeakTube Team PeakTube is developed by an independent and professional team focused on user experience and continuous development. Our Values: âœ¨ Quality Delivering the best possible quality in all aspects of the service ğŸš€ Innovation Using the latest technologies and development methods ğŸ‘¥ User Focus Prioritizing user needs and experience in all decision-making ğŸ”„ Continuous Development Ongoing updates and improvements to the service based on user feedback ğŸ’ Reliability Providing a stable and reliable service under all conditions As a team, we are committed to delivering a product that not only meets current user needs but is constantly evolving and improving.
about_why_content: â­ Why PeakTube? PeakTube stands out with unique competitive advantages, making it the first choice for downloading YouTube videos: âš¡ Fast Downloads Optimized servers and advanced algorithms for maximum download speed ğŸ¥ Diverse Quality Options Support for a wide range of qualities from 480p to 4K and higher ğŸ¤– Intelligent Support 24/7 intelligent assistant to answer questions and solve problems âš–ï¸ Fair Limits Transparent and fair limitation system for free and premium users ğŸ¨ Simple Interface User-friendly and simple design that makes using the service easy for everyone ğŸ”’ Security and Privacy No file storage and protection of user information ğŸ’ Advanced Features Features such as official subtitles, audio extraction, and high qualities PeakTube combines speed, quality, and ease of use to provide you with an unparalleled video downloading experience.
about_terms_content: ğŸ“œ PeakTube Terms of Use By using PeakTube, you agree to the following terms and conditions: ğŸ“‹ Personal Use This service is designed solely for personal and non-commercial use. âš–ï¸ Content Responsibility The user is fully responsible for downloaded content and its use. ğŸš« No Storage PeakTube does not store downloaded files and all files are sent directly. ğŸ“œ Platform Rules Compliance Users must comply with YouTube and other platform rules and regulations. ğŸ”’ Privacy User information is protected and not shared with third parties. âš ï¸ Usage Limitations PeakTube reserves the right to limit or terminate access for users who abuse the service. By using PeakTube, you confirm that you have read and accepted these terms.
about_contact_content: ğŸ“¬ Contact Us We are always ready to answer your questions and receive your suggestions. Contact Methods: ğŸ†˜ Support Use the intelligent support section in the main menu to get help. ğŸ“§ Official Channel For the latest news and updates: @PeakTeam ğŸ’¬ Feedback Share your comments and suggestions with us through intelligent support. We value your feedback and are constantly improving the service based on your input. Response Hours: Intelligent support is available 24/7.
